header.title: Legend Repositioning
header.description: This MOD was engineered to be fully compatible with the latest versions of phpBB3, as well as to provide an easy and convenient method for administrators to reposition their groups on the legend. This MOD allows administrators who have access to manage groups to reposition the groups they have displayed in their legend, both on the index.php and viewonline.php pages. Groups can be easily repositioned by clicking up and down arrows. Each time a group's position is moved, the action is logged in the administrator log. When a new group is added, it is automatically positioned at the end (or bottom) of the group list on the legend. When a group is deleted, the other groups behind it have their positions modified.
header.author-notes: This MOD was inspired by a MOD by CoC titled Group Legend Positioning. One main purpose of this MOD was to create an easy way for administrators to reposition the groups on their legend with as little installation problems as possible, phpBB 3.0.5 and up compatibility, and with an easy-to-use interface.
